workflows.description: Unisolates one or more endpoints in a single request on Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the endpoint ID and other input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Unisolate Endpoints

workflows.description: Retrieves details, including alerts and key artifacts, for a specific incident from Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the incident ID and other input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Get Incident Details

workflows.description: Isolates one or more endpoints in a single request on Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the endpoint ID and other input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Isolate Endpoints

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all the agent versions that are used for creating a distribution list from Palo Alto Cortex XDR.
workflows.name: Get Distribution Version

workflows.description: Retrieves all incidents or specific incidents from Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Fetch Incidents

workflows.description: Updates incident fields like severity, status, etc. of a specific incident in Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the incident ID and other input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Update Incident

workflows.description: Uploads alerts in the CEF format from external alert sources to Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the list of alerts specified. Note: After you have mapped the CEF alert fields to Cortex XDR fields, Cortex XDR displays the alerts in related incidents and views.
workflows.name: Insert CEF Alerts

workflows.description: Uploads alerts in the Cortex XDR format from external alert sources to Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the product, vendor, and other input parameters specified. Cortex XDR displays alerts that are parsed successfully in related incidents and views.
workflows.name: Insert Parsed Alerts

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all your endpoints from Palo Alto Cortex XDR.
workflows.name: Get All Endpoints

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of filtered endpoints from Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Get Endpoints

workflows.description: Runs a scan on all endpoints or specified endpoints on Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the list of endpoint IDs and other input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Scan Endpoints

workflows.description: Cancels a scan on all endpoints or specified endpoints on Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the list of endpoint IDs and other input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Cancel Scan Endpoints

workflows.description: Deletes the specified endpoints from the Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the list of endpoint IDs specified. Note: You can delete up to 100 endpoints.
workflows.name: Delete Endpoints

workflows.description: Retrieves the policy for a specific endpoint from Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the endpoint ID specified.
workflows.name: Get Policy

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of filtered device violations from Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Get Device Violations

workflows.description: Creates an installation package on Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the distribution name and description, and the package type specified.
workflows.name: Create Distributions

workflows.description: Checks and retrieves the status of an installation package from Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the distribution ID specified.
workflows.name: Get Distribution Status

workflows.description: Retrieves the distribution URL for downloading the installation package from Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the distribution ID and package type specified.
workflows.name: Get Distribution URL

workflows.description: Retrieves audit management logs from Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Get Audit Management Logs

workflows.description: Retrieves agent event reports from Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Get Audit Agent Report

workflows.description: Blacklists the specified files that have not already been blacklisted on Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the list of file hash values and other input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Blacklist Files

workflows.description: Whitelists the specified files that have not already been whitelisted on Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the list of file hash values and other input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Whitelist Files

workflows.description: Quarantines files on specified endpoints on Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the list of endpoint IDs, the file path, and the file hash specified.
workflows.name: Quarantine Files

workflows.description: Retrieves the quarantine status for a specific file from Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the endpoint ID, file path, and file hash specified.
workflows.name: Get Quarantine Status

workflows.description: Restores a quarantined file on a specified endpoint on Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the endpoint ID, file hash, and other input parameters specified.
workflows.name: Restore File

workflows.description: Retrieves a file from specific endpoints from Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the list of endpoint IDs, file path, and other input parameters specified. Note: You can retrieve up to 20 files from a maximum of 100 endpoints.
workflows.name: Retrieve File

workflows.description: Retrieves details for a specific file from Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the action ID specified.
workflows.name: Retrieve File Details

workflows.description: Execute xql query on Palo Alto Cortex XDR based on the Query and other parameters specified.
workflows.name: Execute XQL Query

steps.name: Get Query Results By Query ID

arguments.name: Palo Alto Cortex XDR
arguments.operationTitle: Get Query Results By Query ID

workflows.description: Retrieve unique execution ID used to retrieve the results by the Get XQL Query Results API.
workflows.name: Get Query Results By Query ID

routes.name: Start-> Get Query Results By Query ID

workflows.description: Updates one or more alerts based on the specified input parameters.
workflows.name: Update Alerts

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of alerts based on the specified input parameters.
workflows.name: Get Alerts

workflows.description: Uploads IOCs as JSON objects that you retrieved from external threat intelligence sources to Palo Alto Cortex XDR. Note that Cortex XDR does not scan historic data, but rather only new incoming data.
workflows.name: Insert Simple Indicators
Cortex > Create Incident
workflows.description: Creates incident in FortiSOAR

arguments.incidents_status_map: {'new': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Open')}}, 'under_investigation': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('In Progress')}}, 'resolved_known_issue': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Awaiting')}}, 'resolved_true_positive': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Resolved')}}, 'resolved_false_positive': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Resolved')}}, 'resolved_security_testing': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Resolved')}}, 'resolved_other': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Inactive')}}, 'resolved_threat_handled': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Inactive')}}, 'resolved_auto': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Inactive')}}, 'resolved_duplicate': {{'IncidentStatus'| picklist('Inactive')}}  }

workflows.name: Cortex > Fetch
workflows.description: Fetches Incidents from Cortex XDR

step_variables._configuration_schema:
[
  {
    "title": "Pull Sample Incident in Past X Minutes",
    "name": "Pull_Sample_Incident_in_Past_X_Minutes",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "Pull the incidents in the past X minutes. e.g. 14400 minutes are 10 days.",
    "required": true,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": 14400
  },
  {
    "title": "Incident ID List",
    "name": "incident_id_list",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "List of incident IDs. Each item in the list must be an incident ID.",
    "placeholder": "[\"9834\",\"1234\"]",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": ""
  },
  {
    "title": "Status",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "type": "select",
    "options": [
      "New",
      "Under Investigation",
      "Resolved Threat Handled",
      "Resolved Known Issue",
      "Resolved Duplicate",
      "Resolved True Positive",
      "Resolved False Positive",
      "Resolved Security Testing",
      "Resolved Auto",
      "Resolved Other"
    ],
    "name": "status",
    "value": "New",
    "tooltip": "List of status of the incident.",
    "description": "Status of the incident."
  },
  {
    "title": "Limit",
    "name": "limit",
    "type": "text",
    "tooltip": "Integer representing the end offset within the result set after which you do not want incidents returned.",
    "required": false,
    "editable": true,
    "visible": true,
    "value": "5"
  }
]

routes.name: Get Macro Value -> Set Time Configuration

workflows.name: Cortex > Ingest
workflows.description: Fetches Cortex XDR Incidents

routes.name: Create CyOPs record -> Update Last Incident Pull Time

data.name: Sample - Palo Alto Cortex XDR - 1.3.0
data.description: Cortex XDR applies machine learning at cloud scale to rich network, endpoint, and cloud data, so you can quickly find and stop targeted attacks, insider abuse, and compromised endpoints.
